title: New patch 6.24 lagging..
body:
Hello,

When I am in champion select I have an amazing lag on this new patch, wich almost make it impossible to make my select, so I get banned for 30 min everytime. would really like the old patch back. How do I delete this one? 

Best regards,

Jules

replies.body:
We've seen some poor performance with the Beta Client when running on a lower-spec machine. You may want to hop into your client settings (cog in top-right of client) to see if enabling *Low spec mode* and *disabling animations* improves the performance.

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

If that causes no change, you can access the *Legacy Client* from the login screen at any time:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions!
